roleset.name: make the noise of a cuckoo
roleset.note: CUCKOO-V NOTES: Frames file for 'cuckoo' based on dictionary.com. Verbnet entry 38. (from cuckoo.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: Bird
example.text: John cuckooed in hopes of attracting a real Cuckoo.

roleset.name: repeat monotonously
roleset.note: CUCKOO-V NOTES: Frames file for 'cuckoo' based on dictionary.com. Verbnet entry 38. (from cuckoo.02-v predicate notes)

example.name: Repititious Monotony
example.text: John cuckooed his bird call until Mary was ready to kill him.
